SELECT t3.*,t4.nick_name as nick_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT t1.name,t1.tch_id,t1.class_id,t2.name as nick_name FROM mxg_course t1 LEFT JOIN mxg_student t2 ON t1.class_id=t2.class WHERE t1.tch_id = #{req.creator} AND t1.name = t3.course_id GROUP BY t1.name,t1.tch_id,t1.class_id,t2.name ) AS subquery) AS size FROM mxg_paper t3 LEFT JOIN mxg_teacher t4 ON t4.name=#{req.creator} WHERE t3.creator = #{req.creator}
AND t3.course_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.courseId}, '%')
AND t3.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.title}, '%')
ORDER BY t3.create_date DESC

SELECT t3.id,t3.course_id,t3.title,t3.type,t3.creator,t3.create_date,t3.start_date,t3.end_date FROM mxg_paper t3 LEFT JOIN mxg_student t5 ON t5.name=#{req.creator} LEFT JOIN mxg_course t6 ON t6.class_id=t5.class WHERE t3.creator = t6.tch_id
AND t3.course_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.courseId}, '%')
AND t3.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.title}, '%')
GROUP BY t3.id,t3.course_id,t3.title,t3.type,t3.creator,t3.create_date,t3.start_date,t3.end_date ORDER BY t3.create_date DESC
